entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then periods of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:03 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High zero.
